name: The Tube
description:
In this VR escape room game players find themselves inside a tube and will soon realize that there is a ladder that could be used to get to the upper floor. The ladder cannot be reached yet, so there might be puzzles to solve or minigames that require the skill to adeptly move inside this VR environment to reach the next level. The goal is to move through a number of such rooms, each one challenging the player in a different way, to reach the exit at the top and with that, freedom.

We developed this game as a university project for Game Design and Development 2 at TU Graz.
